rows.label: tlk00340104_msg0001
rows.name:
I knew the Boss hated paperwork,
but I never thought it was this bad...

rows.label: tlk00340104_msg0002
rows.name:
The amount of paperwork the Boss left behind
is so overwhelming, it's a real struggle.

rows.label: tlk00340104_msg0003
rows.name:
...You think he was so lively when he left
because he was escaping all this
paperwork?
